entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 8 except minus 17 inland.
entry.summary: Clearing late this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 8 except minus 17 inland. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness in the morning. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Thursday 02 March 2023
